message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you! I'm asking for $180 to start. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I think $150 would be a fair price for me considering my budget.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest. However, I can't go lower than $170 right now. I believe in the value of this product.
Hello Alice, I understand your position. Considering the value of the product, I would like to offer $160. This is my final offer.
